name: Slenderman's Shadow
description: Always watching.

name: Digital Tamers: ReBorn
description: Train, fight, evolve! Digital Tamers: ReBorn is a casual fighting game for all Digimon fans. Your mission is to take care of your partner, keep it strong, healthy in order to evolve and win battles and several prizes! Excel and win the 12 Championships that will take place throughout the year in order to become a true Digimon Tamer! Live this experience and welcome, to the Digital World!

name: GobelinsRPG
description: Will you pass the 20 rounds with one life?

name: Patchy Patients
description: Survive by shooting bandages at moving targets

name: The Morgue: Hospital Escape
description: A game inspired by puppet combo games and texas chainsaw massacre.

name: Late for Class
description: You have two minutes to get to your class.

name: The Sirena Expedition
description: The Sirena Expedition is short PSX-style horror-platformer in which you explore a mysterious underwater facility.

name: Ninja Gang Atack
description: in Ninja Gang Atack you have must escape a few ninjas.

name: Nocturnal Visit
description: Nocturnal Visit is a short horror experience. One late night, you decide to explore this unknown abandoned house hidden in the woods to make an article for your blog. Several rumors say the house is haunted. Your objective/job is to investigate the house to find clues to whether the rumors are real or not.

name: Hungry Ducks
description:
A small game for Haunted PS1 Summer Of Screams.

It's a game about feeding monster ducklings. If there is no food... you become the food!!!

The spoopiness in this one is lagging a bit though. I hope you enjoy it anyway :)

The game does not yet have a propper ending, because I had to finish it in a very small amout of time.

If the mouse sensitivity feels off for some reason, I reccomend downloading the standalone build. There seems to be a weird bug with the mouse sensitivity.

name: There Are Ghosts In These Stalls
description: A short horror game in a bathroom stall.

name: Plead with the Mountain God
description: ​Survive the perilous climb and plead with the mountain god to resurrect your beloved.

name: We Don't Talk About It
description: Art-horror game about how hard it can be to express yourself

name: What Awaits Us Below
description: You are falling. And so is a bunch of buildings. But what is waiting at the end?

name: No Sidewalks in the Mushroom Kingdom
description: Take this lap on foot

name: Hafermann
description: When a tribute is denied, a due must be paid

name: Dying of Thirst
description: It's midnight and you need water.

name: You can't do it alone
description: A short atmospheric horror game

name: Dismember Mind 2
description: If the mind has no members, is it capable of dismemberment?

name: Future Reality
description: Experience the future now!

name: Skywatching
description:
There is something among the stars.
Keep looking up.

A very short horror game. Heavily inspired by LOCAL 58 TV.

name: Silent House
description: Silent House is a short PS1 style survival horror game.

name: An Empty Castle: Laputa
description: Reach the Castle in the Sky

name: The Rite of Ammon
description: Short PS1 style horror game featuring cultists, demons, and leaky pipes

name: Artists of a Dead World
description: A lonely city somewhere at the end of the world.

name: Limsod
description: Limsod is an FPS set in a post-apocalyptic universe in which you must fight for survival in a world infested with flesh-eating zombies. Upgrade your equipment and play in a variety of maps and game modes.

name: The Thirteenth Floor
description: The Thirteenth Floor is a PlayStation 1 inspired first person horror experience, take control of the unsuspecting protagonist as you guide him through the thirteenth floor of the Underlook Hotel to discover what horrific events unfolded there.

name: The Undying Beast
description: There was a flash of light, a choir of glass, and the sound of sirens approaching. Then for what seemed like eternity, a black hollow void. Suddenly you found yourself within a new plane. Dead trees and fog is all that surrounds you. You hear no birds or signs of life, but strange cackles and moans sound from the distance. And then you notice out of the corner of your eye you may not be alone here.

name: Animals In Buildings
description: Non-Scary Game Made For The Haunted PS1 Summer Of Screams

name: Headlines from the Deep
description: A short, PS1-style adventure game about fish-based media production.

name: Llorona
description: Solve the mystery of a Haunted Mansion known as 'La Quinta' and the Ghost of a Weeping woman that wanders the property.

name: The Last Door on the Left
description: A short PSX inspired horror experience.

name: I Am The Caretaker
description: You are the caretaker. Today is your first day on the job. Your task is to carefully observe and report all anomalies and deviations. Can you handle this task?

name: Townseek
description:
Townseek is a relaxing exploration-trading game where you embark on a journey across the world of Explora and discover the lost legacy of Sir Reginald Sharkingston! Discover exotic landmarks, trade with faraway towns, fish, mine, and farm as you complete your journal and make a name for yourself!

The whole world is your sea now, so be sure to see all that it has to offer!

name: GigaSword
description: An action-puzzle metroidvania in which you wield a huge, heavy sword

name: Turgor Pressure
description: After a dive team sent to explore an abandoned facility goes missing, you are tasked with piloting a ROV down below the surface of the ocean to see if you can track them down and either guide them back up, or at least confirm that they're dead. Your ROV is equipped with a scanning system to help you determine what may have happened to the team. Good luck out there, and remember: Something's wrong with the ocean.

name: A Wheel Without a View
description: ONLY ONE RIDE PER DAY. OPEN UNTIL OTHERWISE.

name: Sushi For Robots
description: These robots are obsessed with sushi and you’re the one serving it to them.

name: Homeless Pigeon
description: Giving your desktop a homeless pigeon companion

name: Aatrox's Journey to be Reverted
description: it's a video game.

name: Day in the Life
description: Made for the "Moth" Bitsy Game Jam!

name: This Game is Self-Aware
description: Hang out with our disgruntled self-aware protagonist while bullying him with pop-culture references

name: This Is Fine
description: A game I made in reaction to the 2016 election results. It's a 5 minute game and it's not political. Enjoy :)

name: Constancia
description: A small vignette turned into a small interactive thing.

name: Limbocore
description: Discover the limbo. Play cards with angels.

name: Pixel Islands
description: Can you explore them all ? Let's find the best ones !

name: Nusantara: Bermuda Triangle
description: A fantasy adventure, mystery, drama & romance otome visual novel (GxB) with strong Indonesian flavour. (Not a sequel!)

name: Dank Tomb
description: Solve puzzles in dimly lit corridors and uncover the story of an ancient king gone mad.

name: Snow Cones 2
description: The World's greatest ice-cream-cone romance-saga continues!

name: Between Stations
description: You can't remember what time it is, but you know it is late. You have just checked into your room at the Brownie Cove Hotel. The bed is lumpy and you can't sleep, but the TV is tempting...

name: Aious: World's End
description: Begin your journey as you tried to find the truth of your lost brother.

name: Under Pretense of Death
description: Romantic Visual Novel with Point'n'Click elements

name: Kobold Garden
description: a game

name: Project Home
description: A hack-n-slash/bullet-hell shooter

name: Arken
description: Retro inspired Zelda-like / action adventure

name: Legend of Xenia 3D
description: Tiny first-person Zelda-like with a resolution of 64x64

name: The Struggle of Trust
description: An action adventure platformer in which your ultimate goal is to unravel a great mystery.

name: Spellrazor
description:
If you miss the days of creepy, sinister, neon-tinged arcade games (especially the early work of Eugene Jarvis) that reward deep knowledge and skillful play, then this game is for you.

Spellrazor is an early-1980s-tinged Rogue-meets-Defender/Berzerk arcade-adventure game with (gulp) 27 fire buttons, auto-targeting, a bunch of secrets and a rather creepy meta-story.

Being a conversion of a semi-mythical arcade game developed by Duncan Bower in 1981, this version includes the unusual in-game development/debugger console which exposes the weird, glitchy nightmare of the game's mythology.

name: Smalls Island Woes
description: Go to work, the lighthouse won't fix itself.

name: Frontier Diver Progenexis
description: Dive into the depths of END CITY and discover the horrors NT-Field crisis has left in its wake.

name: Candied Carols
description: A wintry, magical holiday romance

name: Eleutheria
description: Trust. Rebirth. Life after death.

name: Dolphin Island 2
description: Action platforming based on fake game cover art!

name: Remember Places?
description: You are locked inside. The only thing keeping your mind together is your AI best friend. Most places are just a memory to you now.

name: Love & Friendship
description: An Interactive Regency Rom-Com

name: Snowbound Blood
description: Snowbound Blood: A Vast Error Story

name: Whisper in the Dark
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Frog!
description: Space Frog! is an indie adventure game about a frog in space.

name: A Colour Like No Other
description:
A Colour Like No Other is a text-based web game telling a story about expression, vulnerability, and shared burdens. It's about trying to help the people you love, even if you're 99% sure it isn't necessary.

It's also about those things happening in the context of the horror movie unfolding around you. It's okay, though; you're much scarier.

name: Your Merman Boyfriend
description: Meet your merman boyfriend.

name: Rebel Kitsune
description: A cute fox girl explores her small hometown on her way to a date with a friend.

name: Recipe For Love
description: Help a robot list all the ingredients for love

name: Scout: An Apocalypse Story
description: A text choice romance in an apocalyptic setting.

name: Exiled from Court
description: You were exiled from Court. Now, you need to find your way back.

name: Superstition S2
description: Journey deeper into the unknown.

name: There's a Bear Outside
description: Isn't it nice that there is a perfectly normal bear at the window?

name: Fantasy Tea Generator
description: Generate a name for your fantasy tea.

name: Delphine's Discovery
description: Venture into an abandoned orphanage, solve a mystery, and fall in love.

name: Who Stole My Bone?
description: Help Spudz the dog find his precious bone in this short, silly game!

name: Tavern Crawler
description: Slaying the dragon? Easy. Collecting your pay? Not so much.

name: A Bunch of you in a Crowded Room
description: it helps to talk to yourself

name: Worth Waiting
description: You could have sworn someone else was here.

name: The Right Todd
description: Only one Todd has the key that other Todd needs to escape.

name: Tower Offender
description:
This game is all about stopping the Hero from getting to the tower to do what heroes to best. You will have some time to prepare and then can continue your efforts as he progresses.

A twist on the traditional tower defence genre, in this game you can run and jump around the level and place traps and obstacles that should hamper the progress of the hero. Once the hero arrives you can continue to move around and adjust the placement of traps, either by placing more, or by moving the ones you have already placed.

A health bar indicates how much damage the hero has received, and once the hero has no health left, the player wins and can progress to the next level.

name: Deep Down
description: Sin descripción

name: Swap
description: Sin descripción

name: Tailspin!
description: Drill though 24 stages of platforming action!

name: Karlson 2D
description: Karlson is here to kick ass and drink milk, and he's all out of milk.

name: Twinsanity: Omicron
description: Twinsanity: Omicron is an RPG game which is based on the series "Twinsanity The Animated Series". The Story Continues. Two days after defeating Time Shadow, Twinsanity is taking rest in EastCity. Exploring the city, he realises that someone wants his power. Are you ready to solve the mystery?

name: ZFrag
description: Zen Hard Disk Management Tool. Defrag your mind by manually defragging a virtual Hard Disk, sector by sector, or enable the AUTODEFRAG to sit back and watch it do it on its own.

name: Reparative
description: Newly hired by Reparative Faith Counseling, you take your first unsupervised client. How the sessions go is up to you. Play, experiment, share, feel the feels!

name: Artemis' Minesweeper
description: Artemis' Minesweeper is the a hardcore version of minesweeper, a mashup of minesweeper and a bullet hell shoot 'em up. It features Artemis of the Blue Fan-Game by VTuber Numachi Tamanegi.

name: Friagem
description: A game that mixes the mechanics of pushing boxes to specific locations with elements of horror and suspense.

name: Galbia Tales
description: Galbia Tales is a spin off of "La Leggenda Dell'Ultimo Drago" game. It is a frenetic runner game full of action and exploration. Follow the brave swordsman of Galbia kingdom to the search of the missing daughter in 15 different game levels, you'll know a world full of mysteries and magic. Fight hordes of monsters, demons and find the right way to defeat seemingly invincible creatures. Collect coins and gems to get powerful equipment. Don't forget, the time will be your biggest enemy.

name: Tarot
description: A new computer game is not as innocent as it appears when strange and sinister events start to occur.

name: Snake 3310
description: Snake 3310 is a nostalgic horror experience embedded within a Nokia 3310.

name: Andy's Apple Farm
description:
In this game, you play a copy of a fictional beta test version of the game "Andy's Apple Farm", a game that was supposed to be released in the mid-1980s. The game isn't actually a beta test, however, the game's version is designed to appear as one.

The game starts to "glitch" and reveal more of the story behind the game. This game has a lot of secrets to discover so it may require several playthroughs to have different experiences and fully understand the game's internal story.

name: Pretty Please
description: Make me pretty please. A short game about a lady who goes into a beauty clinic to "fix a few things". Features several endings and beautiful artwork, made in 3 days for a game jam. The game contains 497 dialogue blocks, containing 3,644 words and 19,587 characters, for an average of 7.3 words and 39 characters per block. The game contains 11 menus, 15 images, 14 screens, and a total of 3 possible endings.

name: Sweet Punch
description: In a world full of elves, orcs and sirens, you want to find your perfect match... But it can't be anyone! Your partner must be just as awesome as you! Get hit with your crushes and discover love in Sweet Punch!

name: Subconscious
description: What if all your daily routines were there only to repress memories you wished were forgotten?

name: Fallout Equestria: Remains
description: Fallout Equestria: Remains, is a side scrolling post apocalypse action RPG game with ponies. With Littlepip or your customizable character in the lead role, a huge assortment of weapons, creepy wasteland environments, raiders, monsters, physics, telekinesis, quests, skills and perks, excellent animations and much more.

name: Cheating Fate
description: Go against the odds. Survive the night. Cheat your fate.

name: Mole
description: See the light

name: Jo's House
description: Jo's house is a maze building game where you must rearrange the furniture of the HQ Residential House to create the longest path from Jo's bed to one of the exits (front door, back door or garage). At night Jo will start rolling around the house to either attack you, eat a pie or exit the house. Your goal is to survive 3 nights doing the following 2 things: #1: Don't get hit by Jo. #2: Don't let Jo leave the house.

name: Cheating Death
description: Short horror game where you must survive the night filing paperwork

name: Blandville
description: Blandville is a looting/survival horror game with a winter atmosphere and cryptids roaming the forest.

name: Stray
description: Made over 72 hours for the 2017 LÖVE Jam.

name: Hush Little Lily
description: A point-and-click, exploration horror game

name: Locked Inside: Rebirth
description: Locked Inside: Rebirth is a horror PT-like game about a girl locked inside her mind.

name: Ridgewood Road
description: Nobody has seen Lisa Hughes leave her house in a few days. Her neighbors are starting to get a bit worried...

name: Will Die Alone
description: Some memories aren't meant to stay. We are our memories and our experiences. What happens if you delete some of them? If you change your past and, thus, your future?

name: Sorry to Bother You
description: a videogame about technology and journalists

name: Root of Wisdom
description: "Does anybody else remember that game?"

name: Endoparasitic
description: Three limbs ripped off, infected with a deadly parasite, you must save your research. Drag yourself through the corridors of a secret research lab on a remote asteroid, fight off horribly mutated monsters, inject countless syringes of vaccines, and survive at all costs.

name: Paranormal Entities
description: Investigate the spiritual activity still present in the St. Augustine Asylum

name: Home's Embrace
description: Home is where you should be safe, right?

name: Melone in the Dark
description: Know your fruit. Know its name.

name: God Opens the Door
description: God Opens the Door is a short horror game where you flush your mom down the toilet.

name: Avoid
description: Try to avoid everything!

name: Mare
description: The game follows Naomi, who awakens to find that they cannot remember their name, memories, and where they are. All they know is they can hear a lone voice calling to them, "Naomi, come find me."

name: Entity
description: A salvage crew finds a wreck drifting in deep space.

name: TraVRsal
description: Enter your personal holodeck! Alone or together with friends. TraVRsal is a constantly growing collection of games that explore limitless movement! Using intuitive level design and the clever use of play-space - be it big or small - TraVRsal untethers the limits of VR making players feel as if they are freely walking through expansive worlds. Magical worlds, puzzles, traps, enemies and much more. Surprise your friends with a custom-made gallery. Challenge other players. Become the best in each world by beating existing challenges. Due to procedural generation no game is ever the same. There is a creative community to help build your own free-roaming VR games with an easy to learn world builder, and share the work with other players.

name: Heart Rocket
description: A Love Live fangame where it’s Maki’s birthday and Nico needs to find her a perfect present during school hours. There are 2 routes that will take about 1-2 hours to get both endings.

name: PB Makes Lunch
description: PB Makes Lunch is a cute, short RPG about brisk mornings & odd neighbors. Being a polar bear is tough.

name: Memorabilia
description: You don't know what this place is but at the end of the path, you have to make your choice.

name: Video Tennis but the Computer Asks About Your Ex-Girlfriend
description: Sit back, play some old arcade game, and tell your computer about your feelings.

name: Monkeys With Guns
description: 4 Player-Platformer-Arcade-Shooter

name: Kate Goes to Wildflower Grove
description: Lets walk together. You can talk to me, go on a lovely walk with me, hug me... just please, please don't hurt me uwu

name: The Explorers
description: All the hells of this damned frozen land.

name: The Comfort Zone
description: A story about social isolation.

name: Return
description: Can you decide it's time for your pet to go? Return is short interactive storytelling game about how a boy cope with the death of his beloved pet. Can he overcome those feelings?

name: Esc
description: Esc is a Flash puzzle platform game designed with the intention of increasing awareness of domestic violence. You play as a married woman, exploring a cave with her husband, during the "honeymoon" phase of the cycle of abuse.

name: Crystal Caverns
description: Collect treasure from a dangerous cave.

name: Pulse
description: Horizontally smooth-scrolling shoot-'em-up for the Commodore VIC-20.

name: Leo the Amazing Cat
description: Leo the Amazing Cat is a platform game. You can kill the enemies by either jumping on them or by using the cartwheel attack, but be careful some enemies cannot be killed jumping on them and some can not be killed at all, you will have to avoid them.

name: Tabby Cat's Great Catventure
description: In this simple 2D Platform autorruner you and your friends can play as both Tabby The Cat and TibTub the Balloon Kitten who go in an adventure after the evil Wizard of The Mice. This bad sorcerer doesn't want any cats having fun in his land and released his mice minions all over the Kat Kingdom to steal the cat's toys.

name: Tank Time
description: Sin descripción

description: Free and Open Source MMORPG - Embark on an adventure!

name: Beyond the Gate

name: Skynet Simulator

description: Play the psychedelic quest where you fight robots to collect crystals. Upgrade your weapons and find loot in an adventure to defeat the final boss.

name: Leximan
description: Do you like silly hats? Were you that one kid in class who broke reality? Are you eating nutritional slime right now? Embark on a brilliant adventure, using words and incompetence to solve bizarre problems. There are also hat goblins.

description: build your clout and become sneeter famous in this roguelike (kinda??) social media simulator

name: Band Camp Boyfriend
description: Forge new friendships, become a leader, and maybe even find love all while trying to survive band camp!

name: DuckSoup Dungeon
description: Take control of one of the strange heroes in Ducksoup Dungeon and see if you can beat the dungeon. This is a small platformer-roguelike game made for the seven day roguelike challenge.

name: Unicorn Shake
description: A short visual novel about customer service. That's it.

name: Bird Builder
description: Build birds of some shapes and sizes.

name: Ace of Rope
description: A criminal spared by the gallows can control their broken rope. It's time for revenge.

name: Cats n Wires
description:
reconnect wires to save your cats

from this mysterious world!

name: Tiny Clusters
description: A lonely puzzle game in space

name: Desktop Garden
description: Windows-based gardening

name: A (W)hole lot of Colors
description: Match the blocks and create a fitting hole

name: Unaligned
description: Sin descripción

name: Odd One
description: A short, dreamy game made for the Bitsy Midnight Jam.

name: Patient Rogue

name: Spooble: A Search Engine Story

name: Winter, 2001: Someone tell Luigi I love him
description: A short game about brothers, doors, and loneliness.

name: Gasu: The Hugging Dragon
description: Help spread the love with a tiny dragon who loves to hug!

name: Late Work
description: Short horror game where you need to close the office in time

name: Winter's Fall
description: A short winter's tale about learning to let go.

name: Where Do I Fit?
description: A short bitsy game about social exploration

name: You're Going to Make a Great Mother One Day
description: "You're going to make a great mother one day," they say to you. A reproductive horror Twine story that features one ending with a bit of interactivity; about a 10-15 minute read.

name: Mr. Krussy Requires Souls of the Damned
description: Collect 8 souls to escape Mr. Krussy in this Slender esque parody game.

name: Summer Horrordays
description: Summer Horrordays is a Visual Novel/Kinetic Novel featuring a selection of short stories. Each story has different versions that are revealed as the game progresses.

name: Cat Train
description: An idle way to save cats and make happiness. Rescue stray cats! With your train. Cat Train is an idle game where you rescue lost cats with your train and drop them off at Cat Cafes. 100 different pet types to collect, each with their own personality. Saving pets, making happiness!

name: Inflate Me to the Moon
description: Use inflation to launch yourself to the moon!

name: Normal Diner
description: Serve up sandwiches...and more?

name: How Are You Doing?
description: Saying some things can be very hard.

name: Farewell to the Universe
description: God says farewell on the last day of the universe.

name: I Opened the Walls and Found Something Beautiful
description: The world is more than you thought.

name: The Heart of Tales
description: A Medieval Romance Visual Novel

name: Jayce
description: Where are you? What are you doing here?

name: Room of Roilands
description: A Justin Roiland fan game.

name: Gender Dysphoria
description: A short 20 minute non-linear narrative game about negative experiences after coming out as transgender.

name: Parcels and Pollen
description: Sell flowers and make friends!

name: Heartbaked
description: In a beautiful elven village hidden away in a lovely little forest, one pastry chef has just reached the last recipe in a sacred book passed down from her grandmother. Ginger has waited her entire career and quite possibly her life for this, and cannot wait to finally have created everything inside. However, the last recipe requires an ingredient that she doesn't have in her pantry. TRUE LOVE! Ginger must go on a journey to find this true love, hopefully in one of the three admittedly quirky guys she knows. One problem though- she sucks at it. Good luck.

name: Loan Wolf
description: A corporate werewolf vn with wlw monster girls. And student loans.

name: War of Roses
description: Save a flower shop from a corporation. Fall in love. Maybe even at the same time.

name: Cooked with Love
description: The way to the heart is through the stomach!

name: Candy Scabs
description: It's the Void's birthday! Bring candy and presents, or else...!!

name: Mnemonic Devices
description: Mnemonic Devices is a sci-fi/romance about a person who loses their memory, and wakes up to find themselves married to someone they don’t know, with a voice in their head who seems to understand more about their life than they do. To top it all off, they find out they have a terrible choice to make. To help them do it, the player is able to view memories of their past to help them decide their future.

name: 9pm
description: Survive! ...or don't!

name: I've Transmigrated as the Supreme Villainess... but I have no idea WTF I'm supposed to do!
description: Parody Visual Novel of Soul Union.

name: Essence Hunt
description: Sin descripción

name: Medusa's Mini Mystery
description: Help a Medusas hair snakes find out who ate her donut before she wakes up and they all get in trouble!

name: In the pines, in the pines, where the sun never shines
description: A two-bit murder ballad.

A girl in the seat, the artist behind the easel. They have a conversation. The girl's heart is shattered, and the artist's wrist moves no more.

description: Hardcore, short horror survival game, segmented from the full game "Aislin's Story"

name: Ace Defender
description:
Ace Defender is a unique game with both tower defense gameplay elements and, more frequently, turn based SRPG elements. The game focuses on casual play with both passive and active gains each day. Collect and develop heroes, pets, and many other methods of progression and power. Interesting gear system. This is a feature rich, easy and casual, game. Nonetheless, players must build their heroes and teams carefully to succeed.

This is an original and entertaining game with a magic world where every player can become a great hero. Choose your favorite warriors and fight for your faction by completing expeditionary battles, advance through the levels of the Trials Tower.
Play with your friends and form an alliance to apply your combined wits, strategy and tactics to become the most powerful alliance in the land.

name: Out of Ammo
description: Out of Ammo is a mix of retro shmup and breakout with aesthetics hugely inspired by ZeroRanger. Eliminating priority enemies/bosses is all that's needed to progress, instead of each stage dragging on until every last stationary helpless block is vanquished. Also, there are bonus objectives in some stages.

name: Stuck!
description: Stuck! is a game in 48 hours with the theme of "running out of space". Reach the door before the next stop!

name: Bonkers
description: Help Apple rescue her dog from the fiendish Dr. Onion through the power of punching!

name: Gravity
description: Have fun with gravity!!!

name: Feed the Ducks
description: Feed the Ducks is a short casual platformer game with pixel graphics.

name: Dodge
description: Dodge is a fast paced reflex game. Survive as long as possible by avoiding enemies, patterns, and boost your score using various powerups to obtain the highest highscore. Customize your games by changing the game's color palette, or its gameplay settings, such as the difficulty, disabling powerups or patterns. Every gameplay setting combination has its own highscore.

name: Underneath
description: Underneath is an action platformer that can be played with single mouse only. Position your pistol well to survive hazards of this mysterious temple. Find your way to whats down below and witness the true power of whats underneath.

name: Echo
description: Trapped in her own Subconscious, Mira wakes up to find herself in dark but strangely familiar place.

name: Don't Look
description: Don’t Look is a 3D side-view horror game using the Eye tracking technology. Play as a child who went looking for his dog in a dark and mysterious vicinity. Explore the environment controlling a flashlight with your eyes, but beware, things are lurking in the shadows…

name: Again
description: Escape from an ever shifting, ever shrinking maze construct - a polymorphic computer simulation!

name: Two Worlds
description: A sokoban-like where you have to create an environment for the inner world from the outer world.

name: Penumbra
description: An ever-expanding world hides behind an underground obelisk. Few know its secrets, however you're not the first.

name: Jawbreaker
description: Jawbreaker is a 2D arcade style beat em up. The rules are simple: get as high up the elevator as you can before meeting your fate at the hands of the enemies. Fight for the highest score! Jawbreaker can also be played with a buddy! Grab a friend and hit the elevator together as a team. Or, if you've got a score to settle, face off in Versus Mode!

name: Streamline
description: Grow your line to reach the goal in Streamline. The hand-crafted puzzles contain a variety of unique interesting mechanics, and range from easy to fiendishly difficult. These should keep you busy for a while, but if you manage to finish them all, there is also an infinite mode with procedurally-generated puzzles.

name: Master Break
description: Master Break is a snooker themed quiz game that can be played by up to four players. In a single player game the aim is to get the highest break (up to a maximum of 147) while the multi player game is simply about getting the highest score. The player starts with a red ball question and the player has to answer by choosing one of three alternatives before time runs out. After that the player can choose between balls of different colours with different subjects. There are six categories of questions: science & nature, pop music, geography, sports & pastimes, art and history. Each player can pass up to three red questions. In a multi player game an "over pocket" sign might appear and answering wrong will then lead to a foul shot. Foul shots lead to the opponents being awarded points.

name: Final Shot
description: Final Shot is a perma-death fps in which the only way to reload is to rewind time. The game was made in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme "rewind." Shoot your way through countless waves of enemies while simultaneously upgrading your character and getting new weapons.

name: I Love Hue Too
description: A mind-bending color adventure. I Love Hue Too is a psychedelic journey into color, light and shape. As in the first game, players arrange colored mosaic tiles to create perfectly ordered spectrums. However, I Love Hue Too includes over thirty brand new geometric tiling patterns to create mind-bending challenges that test the player's color perception and logic even further.

name: Terminal
description: A Strange Computer In a Strange Place

name: Visitor
description: An atmospheric horror game, inspired by black and white movies and liminal spaces.

name: Animal Crackers
description:
Today's the President's birthday! As one of the only Independent members of the Animal Congress, it is up to you, an adorable tie-wearing mouse, to break the gridlock and ensure the President has the greatest party ever!

You will get to meet and greet many animals on your quest to gather party goods. Some items the President will love; others not so much—talk to a diverse zoo of characters to find out which. Make sure to invite a guest of honor, too!

name: Veloce
description: Way back in the twentieth century, as we reached for the stars, we came across an offensive entity, known as the Peste Nera. This entity attacked our planet years ago, out numbering any defenses we had. But now it’s our time to fight back. We are Veloce, the elite galactic defense force. Equipped with the most agile fighters in the world, the enemy won’t know what hit them!

name: Aikatsu!
description: Aikatsu! is an arcade collectible card game based on the anime. The game revolves around using collectible cards featuring various clothes to help aspiring idols pass auditions.

name: Aikatsu Stars!
description: Aikatsu Stars! is an collectable card arcade game based on the anime. The new series introduces the new type of coords: the Star Premium Rare Dresses, as well as the rival school, Venus Ark.

name: Aikatsu Stars! My Special Appeal
description: Aikatsu Stars! My Special Appeal is the second 3DS game of the Data Carddass Aikatsu Stars! arcade series, and is the expansion of Aikatsu Stars! First Appeal.

name: Aikatsu Friends!
description: Aikatsu Friends! is an arcade collectible card game in Bandai's Data Carddass line of machines. It is the successor and spin-off to the Aikatsu! and Aikatsu Stars! series of arcade games. The game revolves around using collectible cards featuring various clothes to help aspiring idols pass auditions.

name: Aikatsu Planet!
description: Aikatsu Planet! is an arcade collectible card game in Bandai's Data Carddass line of machines. Unlike the Aikatsu!, Aikatsu Stars!, Aikatsu Friends!, and Aikatsu on Parade! series of arcade games, it revolves around using collectible swing cards for idol battle stage.

name: Show by Rock!! Fes A Live
description: Show by Rock!! Fes A Live is a rhythm mobile game based on the anime. It is a free-to-play with a Gacha monetization system. Come join the legend about young musicians who dream of becoming top stars!!

name: The Fox in the Forest
description: The Fox in the Forest is a competitive trick-taking card game for 2 players. Play 13 cards each round to win tricks, and score points depending on how many tricks you win. The player with the most points at the end wins.

name: Daytona USA
description: The player is put behind the wheel of a stock car (known as the Hornet), with the choice of three tracks as well as an automatic or manual transmission. The player's objectives are to outrun the competing cars, and complete the race before time runs out.

name: SpikerMan Game
description:
SpikerMan is an RPG with a large explorable world, colorful characters, and uses the LMBS (Linear Motion Battle System), a battle system that takes place in real time.

SpikerMan is an eager teenager who wants to become a great and unstoppable warrior. Along his journey he will fight against a great number of foes, evil space emperors, crime lords, pirates, overlords, and even space gods.
Gather your teammates, journey to other planets, complete side quests, gain power, and bring down everyone in your way to become the Great and Powerful SpikerMan!

name: Entails
description: Entails is a 2D platformer, shooter game where the player must disinfect a human body. The player must go through parts of the human body, fighting both the different viruses and the body's defenses.

name: Daytona USA
description: The player is put behind the wheel of a stock car (known as the Hornet), with the choice of three tracks as well as an automatic or manual transmission. The player's objectives are to outrun the competing cars, and complete the race before time runs out.

Pac-Man

Pole Position

Galaxian
Information, sketches and pictures for each title are available.

name: Down for a Cross
description: An online website for playing crosswords solo or collaboratively. Users can also upload their own puzzles for others to play.

name: Beneath Steel Clouds
description: Beneath Steel Clouds is a life-sim set in a dystopian future with a cyberpunk aesthetic and themes but without the gritty, grim-dark tone and with a healthy dose of snark added on top. You have thirty days to get a grip on your life, earn (or get) some credits and hopefully get the girl. Get on it, chummer, things ain’t gonna solve themselves! They never do.

name: Those Nights at Rachel's
description: A FNaF fangame based around the animatronic bunny "Rachel" and others, you have to survive a week in a restaurant while animatronics hunt you down.

description: Futanari babe, Brittany is home alone with her toys and she needs someone to take care of her. Help Brittany reach the ultimate climax and watch her explosive cumshot in this next generation 3DX Game.

Hentai Cowgirl is a relaxing puzzle game.
Enjoy the beauty girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.
Watch the full picture after completing the puzzle.

name: Project Mod
description:
Welcome to PROJECT MOD (tentative title), a sandbox platform where anyone can freely create content! Built with MapleStory IP, Project MOD provides simple to professional-level creation tools for the users to construct their own virtual world using not only the assets provided by MapleStory IP and other games of Nexon, but also the assets uploaded by the users themselves.

PROJECT MOD enables content development across both PC and Mobile platforms and has two different modes, EASY Mode and PRO Mode, to accommodate users with different needs in creating content. The EASY Mode provides templates to make development on Mobile convenient. These templates include but are not limited to RPG, Platformers, and PvP. The PRO Mode features an integrated development environment that supports IntelliSense and has an error tracking system consisted of a debugger, call stack, and logging system.

name: Cyber Lady
description: Help the beautiful girls to immerse themselves in their memories and remember the wonderful moments of their lives. This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.

name: Last Colony
description:
Run your colony after the collapse of society

Recruit colonists, craft weapons and supplies and venture out from your colony base to gather resources
Life is rough in the new world with hardcore shooter gameplay to match

Craft guns, bombs, meds and armor
Upgrade your guns with 50+ possible combinations
Chose an ability that matches your play style
Level up to unlock more crafting recipes

name: Cats are Assholes
description: Cats are Assholes is a shelter simulation game made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 40. All you have to do is to take great care of your beloved stray cats. If you fail, they will eat you, plain and simple. Make sure the fridge and the bowls are always full of fish, empty the litter boxes, buy extra equipment and upgrade your existing fridge capacity. Be sure to use Mark, your grandson, as often as possible! That's basically how you do multi-tasking in this house.

Hentai artist LeArtNi painted pictures with beautiful girls and put them in the gallery. But here's the ill luck: the electricians confused something and the lighting in the gallery went out! You have to repair the electrical circuit in order to enjoy these pictures!

RIDE. SCRAP. BURN.

FUMES is a single-player game inspired by the golden era of vehicular combat genre. Straight-forward, fast paced, intense gameplay. Get into the car, slap some weapons on and cruise twisted wastes.

No bullscrap. Just you, your car and pure fun. Like in the old days!

name: Sonic 3D in 2D
description: Sonic 3D in 2D is a fangame that reimagines Sonic3D Blast plot and levels with style and structure closer to the games that preceeded it. Explore Flicky Island in a 2D side scrolling platformer that takes elements from the other Mega Drive/Genesis games to re-forge an adventure anew. Fight new and challenging bosses, save Flicky Island and stop Robotnik's final plan to harness the Flicky's power for himself.

Meet anime mistresses!
Follow their commands (in real life)!
That includes touching yourself. A lot. Have fun!

Fap Queen 2 is a JOI game, where cute anime mistresses command you to play with yourself in various kinky ways. Endure their challenges and torments long enough, and the Queen might reward you in the end.

name: Demon's Nightmare: Ar Ek-Qua Er Seta
description: A game with no focus, only dreams and ideas. A mashup of pre-existing visual assets, new musical work, and nearly anything I want to prototype and play with. The lack of theme is the strongest theme of all. A lightly and abstractly story-driven single player STG-platformer hybrid focusing on weird scoring systems, inconsistent and cryptic rules for those scoring systems, and difficulty that will only push you as hard as you push it - except the boss encounters. They always push, and if you don't put in the effort leading up to them, you won't get far.

name: Hentai Fetish Tycoon
description:
Hentai Fetish Tycoon is nothing short of a typical idle tycoon game. You start off by completing the tasks and earning money. From there you can purchase upgrades, automate tasks, or purchase new tasks. Unlike other idle tycoons, when unlocking a new task you're rewarded with a big ol' face full of hentai! Each of the 50 tasks is centered around a specific fetish. Task picture rewards will start off mild and slowly progress WELL into the NSFW realm.

Earn. Upgrade. Nosebleed. Repeat.

name: Magenta Horizon: Neverending Harvest
description: Magenta Horizon is a fast-paced 2D action platformer game that is heavily inspired by the Spectacle Fighter genre. Playing as a Reaper of the twisted purgatorial afterlife, push your skills to the limit to destroy the hordes of demons and epic bosses to reach your destination.

name: EverCraft Online
description: A world of adventure and excitement awaits you in Adrullan! Getting back to the classic roots of the MMORPG genre, EverCraft Online is designed to be a demanding, yet rewarding multiplayer experience. Band together and forge friendships as you slay epic beast, master ancient magics, craft potions and armor, and befriend or pillage unique civilizations. Bend destiny to your will as you travel a world long abandoned by the gods, unraveling the mystery of their divine power as it slowly seeps back into the land. Race to harness the might of their divine arcana -before your enemies get their first.

description: An eerie point and click puzzle game. No saves, no loading: a one-shot short story!

name: Barghest
description: Liberate the spirits of the damned with your blessed sword!

name: The Last Resistance
description: A short sci-fi horror shooter

name: Mr. Gray and the Island Invasion
description: A short game that is a parody of old B-movie Science Fiction and 1980's music videos.

name: Reclaim Earth
description: Slay Aliens to Reclaim Earth!

name: Cosmic Castaway
description: An explorer crashlands on an asteroid

name: Long Nights
description: A tired space cabbie ferries her last passenger for the day... with an unexpected result.

name: Spacebar
description: Spacebar restaurant management simulation

name: The Undercroft 12
description: Sin descripción

name: Mission Massive Migration
description: Blast your way through an alien planet!

name: Replanet
description: Replanet is a little game about an alien whose mission is to repair the damage we have done to our planet. He must put an end to all pollution and make our planet colorful again!

name: Beyond Terra
description: You and your crew crash land on an alien planet. You must scavenge for supplies so you can attempt to escape.

name: Lovesick
description: A bride. A groom. And special guest: food poisoning.

name: Tabula Rasa
description: A creepy blend of a visual-novel and a platformer.

name: Shrimp Slam It
description: Slam shrimp faster than your bro

name: First Kiss
description: Two teens. A sleepover. True love.

name: Crystals of Irm
description: Crystals Of Irm is an old school RPG with a distinctive combat system and dungeon crawl elements. With three heroes you explore Irm, visit the different regions of the land and climb deep down into the darkest dungeons.

name: Cart Farmer
description: Farm the sharecart. Cart Farmer is a SHARECART1000 compatible adventure game. It was made over 48 hours for Teacart1k game jam. You're a lonely farmer who watches over a modest plot of land. One day you notice your grounds seem to be controlled by forces outside your universe...

name: Hakei
description:
This is a tribute to OHRRPGCE community, aimed to recreate the aesthetics surrounding amateur game development 20 years ago.

Explore barren wastelands of dying world and free three sources of power circulating through Universe to bring renovation. Use keys in the text file to decipher special messages from characters in this small adventure quest.

name: Food of Fortune
description: Manage your own food cart, choose your own menu and buy your ingredients.

name: Last of Light
description: A rogue-like action platformer game with procedural generated elements.

name: Auldhame
description: Travel to find your home, in an odd, lonely world.

name: Bob and Rob
description: First you help Bob, then you help Rob.

name: The Forgoatten Isles
description: Explore a simple, dark and mysterious atmosphere, to discover a curious and deadly mystery.

name: I am working
description: Your work will not love you back

name: Hunt, Hunter, Hunted
description: HHH is a short rpg game filled with mystery that you have to figure out as each day go by. Who is there to trust?

name: Dreamwhale II
description: A RPG in a very minimalistic fashion. Takes about as long to complete as drinking a cup of coffee(recommended).

name: Wet Squirrels
description: Sin descripción

name: The Inner Light
description: A short experimental game about finding the light amongst the darkness.

name: Circle Bash
description: Are you better, faster,smarter?

name: Ganbaru
description: Ganbaru is an action-adventure platformer in development by Kevin Lopez.

name: A Tangled Path
description: ​A game about somewhat losing sight of the path you're following. Something of a puzzle game, as well.

name: Angel Maker
description: First person horror game with non-Euclidean level design.

name: Chamber of the Greblicks
description: In this top-down puzzle game, explore the chamber and try to find a way to escape with your life.

name: Metamorbob
description: 3 unique capacities, 5 levels and 1 boss, Can you reach the end in this perma-death adventure?

name: Trappy Duck
description: In this adventure, you will go through 28 levels where you need to avoid traps that may not be what they look like!

name: Winter Fox
description: Classic platformer, with hand-drawn artwork

name: Looming Darkness
description: 2D, top-down retro-style game that takes place in a pitch black creepy cave with a dark fantasy setting.

name: Endless Rain
description: Explore the crypt full of traps and mysteries

name: Monsters Come Out
description: Hallucinations are manifestations of our deepest rooted secrets...

name: Just Another Day
description: Explore the house of a young Polish girl named Nadia, on the advent of World War II, and discover a tragedy.

name: Case White
description: Sin descripción

name: Firebox

description: Train, train, wherever it goes

name: The Train of Souls
description: An adventure on a train with souls and poetry

name: Planet Express
description: Embark on a wild ride aboard the Desert Express!

name: Super Nova's Symphony
description: Super Nova's Symphony: Sci-fi RPG rhythm game.

description: Feed them honey! Upgrade your bees! Defend your queen!

description: Survive the Nest and Try Not to Fall!

name: Bloody Legless

description: Ask the mirror and discover who's the most beautiful person in this realm.

name: TimeTrade
description: In this game, you have to earn money so the timer doesn't get 0. In order to do this you have to work. In TimeTrade are many ways to earn but also to spend and lose money. But always remember you have to give your money away to be able to make more money! There are many things and places for you to discover.

name: Get Beneath the Surface
description: Sin descripción

name: Notice Period

name: Rats Under My Skin
description: Be a cat. Hunt infection. Travel beneath the surface. A small, pouncy game created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 29.

name: Emerita
description: A puzzle game about digging carefully through falling sand. Made for for LD29

name: Helevenium
description: Beneath the surface, at the Helevenium, there is nothing but death. #LD29

name: Density Experiment

name: DeliveryGuy
description: A simple game that kinda sorta simulates a delivery guy's life

name: There You Are
description:
An exploratory narrative game about grief featuring stop-motion inspired graphic design and two endings based on your choices and actions.

You take the role of Su as you try to deal with her life and get away from the past.

name: Tiny Jump
description: A game about catching falling clouds fast!

name: Dreamdisc
description:
Dream emulator based on 5 of my dreams.

5-in-one Dream Collection, transposed into readable disc format.
Dreams dreamt by Adam Pype with sounds by Viktor Kraus.
